DOC.brief_summary: - Objective : - To compare rate extent absorption Torrent Pharmaceuticals Limited , India , sertraline Pfizer , Inc. , USA ( Zoloft ) sertaline , administer 1X100 mg tablet , fasted condition . - Study Design : - Single-dose , open-label , randomized two-way crossover .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Sertraline 100 mg Tablet ZOLOFT Following 100 mg Dose Healthy Subjects Under Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: Male female , smoker non smoker , 18 year age old . Capable consent . BMI > = 19.0 < 30.0 kg/m2 Clinically significant illness surgery within 4 week prior administration study medication . Positive test hepatitis B , hepatitis C , HIV screen . ECG abnormalities vital sign abnormality ( blood pressure ) . History significant alcohol drug abuse within one year prior screen visit . History allergic reaction heparin , sertraline relate drug . Use investigational drug participation investigational study 30 day prior administration study medication . Clinically significant history gastrointestinal pathology , liver kidney disease , neurological , cardiovascular , pulmonary , hematologic , immunologic , psychiatric metabolic disease . History seizure , suicide attempt , bipolar disorder manic episode . Depot injection implant drug 6 month prior administration study medication . Breastfeeding subject . Positive urine pregnancy test screening . Female subject child bear potential unprotected sexual intercourse nonsterile mail partner within 14 day prior study drug administration . Acceptable method contraception : 1 . Intrauterine contraceptive device ( place least 4 week prior study drug administration ) 2 . Condom diaphragm + spermicide .
